titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Summer and Special Programs Records Concerning the National Endowment for the Humanities Summer Seminar Program
Yale Summer and Special Programs Records Concerning the National Endowment for the Humanities Summer Seminar Program
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:34

did.unittitle: Yale Summer and Special Programs records concerning the National Endowment for the Humanities summer seminar program, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of administrative and personnel files documenting finances, transfers, faculty members, housing, and program guidelines of the National Endowment for the Humanities (NEH) summer seminars at Yale.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 15-B (YRG 15-B), Records of specific Yale summer and special programs.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Summer and Special Programs Records Concerning the National Endowment for the Humanities Summer Seminar Program (RU 286). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of administrative and personnel files documenting finances, transfers, faculty members, housing, and program guidelines of the National Endowment for the Humanities (NEH) summer seminars at Yale.
